House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07890
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REQUIRING ALL PUBLIC ELEMENTARY AND SECONDARY SCHOOLS TO PREPARE AND IMPLEMENT A LAND USE DEVELOPMENT AND INFRASTRUCTURE PLAN FOR THE OPTIMUM UTILIZATION OF ITS RESOURCES IN ADDRESSING BASIC EDUCATION FACILITY SHORTAGES
ABSTRACT : Mandates all public schools to prepare and implement a land use development and infrastructure plan which will contribute to a more conducive teaching-learning and recreation area for the students and faculty for the holistic development of learners. Requires that infrastructure and physical facility requirements must comply with the prevailing disaster risk reduction and mitigation measures.
ALIAS NAME : “Public School Site Development and Infrastructure Plan Act of 2016.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VARGAS, ALFRED D.
DATE FILED : 2018-06-27
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE ON 2018-07-30
